name: GMTKJAM2021
description:
The twins can only reach the next level if they work together . The Twins can jump and through bombs. It is a short puzzle platformer.

please notice: to start you have to click once on the game screen

Use Keyboard

  • left and right arrow keys to move
  • up arrow key  to jump
  • space bar to through bombs

Enjoy the game!

It is my first published game and my first game jam game.  

Music: Free Ambient Music (Loop) by MaySama https://maysama.itch.io/
